headline: Strong Q3 Results and $500 Million Buyback Might Change the Case for Investing in AvalonBay (AVB)
summary: In late October 2025, AvalonBay Communities announced strong third quarter results with year-over-year growth in revenue and net income, confirmed new earnings guidance for the remainder of the year, and launched a new US$500 million share repurchase program with no set expiration. The combination of robust operating performance, updated forward-looking expectations, and a fresh share buyback authorization highlights management’s confidence in the company’s financial health and long-term...
